settings.heading: Australia Tennis Events & Rankings
settings.description: The UTR Rating is the official rating for tennis in Australia! It’s easier than ever for Australians to find level-based play and enhance their tennis experience. Get started today by creating your free Competitive Player Profile, the first step to joining the UTR Sports global community.

settings.heading: I need a Tennis Australia Tennis ID and a UTR Rating
settings.description: If you don't have a Tennis Australia Tennis ID or a UTR Rating, start here to get your free UTR Rating and join UTR Sports, the largest global tennis community. Step 1 - Activate your UTR Rating. Step 2 - Link your TA account.

settings.heading: I have a Tennis Australia ID but need a UTR Rating
settings.description: If you have a Tennis Australia Tennis ID but need a UTR Rating, start here to get your free UTR Rating and join the largest global tennis community. We will connect your two accounts.

settings.heading: I have a UTR Rating but need a Tennis Australia Tennis ID
settings.description: If you have a UTR Rating but need a Tennis Australia Tennis ID, register on tennis.com.au for free. We will connect your two accounts. Step 1 - Sign up at Tennis Australia. Step 2 - Link your UTR Rating.

settings.heading: What is my Competitive Player Profile?
settings.row_content: Your Competitive Player Profile is the unique profile generated by connecting your Tennis Australia Tennis ID and UTR Rating. With this connection established, your playing history and upcoming match data will be stored securely, enabling access to advanced analytics.

settings.heading: Why do I need a Competitive Player Profile?
settings.row_content: All players competing in Australia must have a Competitive Player Profile in order to enter endorsed events and leagues. This change went into effect 1 September 2023. Already 50,000 Aussies have completed their Competitive Player Profile! So whether you play for fun at your local club or professionally on the UTR Pro Tennis Tour, your Competitive Player Profile will ensure you have the best playing experience for your level.

settings.heading: How can I become a UTR Sports Power Member?
settings.row_content: Once you’ve completed your Competitive Player Profile (see above steps), learn more about becoming a Power Member by clicking here.

settings.heading: What is the UTR Rating?
settings.row_content: The UTR Rating is the world’s most accurate rating system. It promotes fair and competitive play across the tennis world. All players are rated on the same 1.00-16.50 point global scale based on daily match results.

settings.heading: Tennis Australia: FAQs on UTR Sports

settings.description: The UTR Rating is the best way to measure yourself against all other players regardless of their age or level.
settings.author: Novak  Djokovic

settings.description: UTR Sports provides a standard for all players... the bigger the network gets, the more beneficial.
settings.author: Jim Courier

settings.description: The UTR Rating is ageless, genderless, and borderless. It truly democratizes the game.
settings.author: Martina Navratilova

settings.description: UTR Sports helps us make the game even more accessible to an ever-widening universe.
settings.author: Ken Solomon

settings.description: The UTR Rating enables youngsters and adults at the same level to play, which is so important for their development and enjoyment.
settings.author: Jose Higueras

settings.heading: JOIN UTR SPORTS
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy more tennis and pickleball and connect with players near you on the UTR Sports app.
